name: Pokedex
projectDetails: Used HTML, CSS, and JS to utilize an open-source API to develop a Pokedex application where users can look up their desired Pokemon with ease. Devised a project plan consisting of low to high fidelity wireframes in Figma

name: Cat-alog
languagesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, EJS, ExpressJS, Mongoose, Node, and Bootstrap
projectDetails: Utilized HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, EJS, ExpressJS, Mongoose, Node, Figma, and Bootstrap to develop a full stack application where users can create, read, update, and delete cats in the Cat-alog.

name: Road Trip Buddy
languagesUsed: HTML, CSS/SCSS, JavaScript, React, Mongoose, and MongoDB
projectDetails: Built a responsive front-end framework utilizing React to ensure proper rendering across devices and scalable UI components for future development with HTML, CSS/SCSS, JavaScript, React, Mongoose, and MongoDB.
